actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of child's insurance benefits to a great-grandchild legally adopted by a retired or disabled worker, the same as such benefits would be payable under present law to the worker's legally adopted grandchild.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of child's insurance benefits to a great-grandchild legally adopted by a retired or disabled worker, the same as such benefits would be payable under present law to the worker's legally adopted grandchild.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of child's insurance benefits to a great-grandchild legally adopted by a retired or disabled worker, the same as such benefits would be payable under present law to the worker's legally adopted grandchild.
